ValidationRule.description: A reason must be entered when an Opportunity is Lost
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( Record_Id__c == $CustomMetadata.Constant__mdt.Opp_Standard_Record_Type_Id.Value__c , AND( OR(ISPICKVAL (StageName, "Closed Lost"),ISPICKVAL (StageName, "Cancelled")), ISBLANK(TEXT(Loss_Reason__c)), NOT(CONTAINS($Label.Users_Exclusion,$User.Username)) ) , False)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a reason for the Loss of this Opportunity.
